data.title: Cron Job for WordPress on siteground
data.meta_description:
I needs some help please, I am trying to set up a CRON job in the Cpanel of my Siteground hosting with the following string with the admin username and password for my WordPress install.

 /usr/loc...
data.text:
On Siteground I use the wp-cli method as I find that more reliable:

/usr/bin/wp --user=USERNAME --url=https://EXAMPLE.ORG --path=/home/CPUSER/public_html --timezone="PHPTZ" civicrm api job.execute auth=0

replace CPUSER with the cpanel username , USERNAME with your WP Username, make sure the url is your site's canonical url and set the php timezone (eg America/New_York)
